City Administration

**Street Address**  
Columbus City Hall  
605 Spring  
Columbus, TX 78934

Phone: 979.732.2366  
Fax: 979.732.8213

**Mailing Address**  
P. O. Box 87  
Columbus, TX 78934

After Hours Emergencies: 9-1-1 or  979.732.2388

City Manager

Donald Warschak     
Office: 979.732.2366 x 223  
[Email the City Manager](mailto:drw89@columbustexas.net)  
  

The City Manager is responsible for the day-to-day operation of the City.  All departments, with the exception of Municipal Court, are directly under the authority of the City Manager.  
  
The City Manager also serves in the capacity of City Treasurer, Investment Officer, Purchasing Agent, Emergency Management Coordinator, Floodplain Administrator, Zoning Code Enforcement Officer, and Health Officer.  
  
[Fraud Detection & Prevention](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0141/docs/FRAUD%20POLICY.pdf)

City Secretary

Bana Schneider  
Office: 979.732.2366 x 224  
[Email the City Secretary](mailto:secretary@columbustexas.net)  
  
The City Secretary is responsible for maintaining official city records, including minutes of City Council meetings, appointments for boards and commissions, public bids, and contracts. In addition, the Secretary is responsible for conducting official City elections. The City Secretary is also the City's Finance Director, Records Management Officer and Secretary of the Planning & Zoning Commission.

Assistant City Secretary/HR Manager

Dinah Jacobs  
Office: 979.732.2366 x 225  
[Email the Assistant City Secretary](mailto:jacobsd@columbustexas.net)  
  
The Assistant City Secretary provides support for the City Secretary.
